title: Nossa Senhora dos Remédios e Amparo (Chapel of)
original_title: Nossa Senhora dos Remédios e Amparo (Capela de)
body: Attached to the manor house of the Viscounts of São João, on Rua das Maravilhas, its current owner, Dr. Rui Bettencourt da Câmara, founded a chapel of this invocation, which was blessed on January 1, 1940.
